A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. Petulant Luke never gets back to his old form.  There are many Tangents.  There is the token Love triangle with Finn.  Did the slow anticlimactic chase between the rebel flag ship and the first order fleet seem illogical to anyone else?  If you had overwhelming numbers like the first order\, wouldn't you just send in ships from other directions since your prey is moving predictably in a straight line?  Odd that there is such a discrepency between critic and audience scores - are critics being paid off or something.  I could see a 75%\, but 93% to 56% something smells fishy.
